description:
Submodular selection can be used to reduce a complex data set down to a representative subset. This subset can then be used to train machine learning models with high efficiency and resulting accuracy. In this talk we will introduce apricot, a Python package for submodular selection, and show examples of its usage.

See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: apricot: Submodular Selection for Data Summarization
